title: Which category do i put on my support ticket if i want to report someone?

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

You should only send reports to player support if it's a case where you couldn't report the player normally. For example; if a player is forcing people to dodge in champion select, or if your end-game screen crashes and you are unable to report players.

Anyway, the catergory you should use is:
**_[I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games.] > [Game and Features] > [General Questions]_**
